translations.translation: except for Your chosen slaves among them.'
Other than the chosen ones among Your creatures."
except those of Your servants, the chosen ones from amongst them.”
except Your sincere servants among them".
Except Your true servants amongst them."
Except Thy servants from among them, the purified ones.
excepting those Thy servants among them that are sincere.'
Save Thy single-minded slaves among them.
except for those among them who are Your chosen servants."
Save Thy bondmen among them Sincere.
except Your exclusive servants among them.’
Except Thy Servants amongst them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."
Except Your chosen slaves amongst them (faithful, obedient, true believers of Islamic Monotheism)."
except those among them who are Your sincere worshipers'
Except for your loyal servants among them.”
Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
[38:83] except those servants of Yours among them who will be saved’, namely, the believers.
(Save Thy single minded slaves) save those slaves who are protected from me (among them) among the children of Adam.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِلاَّ عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ } [ص: 83] وهم الموقنون المخلصون، الذين أخلصوا في عموم أعمالهم وأحوالهم معك، واعتصموا بحبل توفيقك، راجعين رحمتك وضوانك، هاربين من سخطك بلا ميل لهم إلى ما يلهيهم عن ربهم
